name: Angry Burdz
description:
Decided to get into 2D. Used to play a lot of angry birds a few years ago, this is me trying to clone the mechanics while discovering what i can do in 2D.

Controls :
click and drag to choose a direction
Release to launch your burd.
Clear enemies to get to next level.  (2 levels at the moment)

Assets are from opengameart.org
